item.description:
This month's Activity - Charms!!

Ellen will lead us in using collage and painting techniques to create one-of-a-kind charms to add to your journals, project or whatever type of chain you like (charm bracelet, necklace, pendent, etc).

Materials to be used include lots of different kinds of paper as you would use for collage, rubber stamps and inks, Diamond Glaze, resin, bottle caps, buttons, Scrabble tiles, dominos, beads, Xyron machines, found objects, various metal things, wire, shrink plastic, PVC tubing and alcohol inks.

Ellen is most excited to show you charms involving the PVC tubing, the shrink plastic and metal with resin charms. Bottle caps, buttons, Scrabble tiles and dominos will be used as the basis for our own unique artwork.

SUPPLIES: Please bring any of the above mentioned materials that you already have plus StazOn brand ink pads and alcohol inks. You might want to buy your own resin if you have lots of things you want to try...I have some resin for us to play with but probably not enough. You can buy it online here:

http://www.fusionbead...

Or at a store in Brookline Village called "Abielle".

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group
